text_content: vanshb03/New-Grad-2026: 2025 & 2026 New grad full-time roles in SWE, Quant, and PM.
Join the Discord to connect with fellow peers and streamline your newgrad search.
For Canadian new-grad roles, check out
collect proper fields from eval data and bug fixes
calculate correctness based on ground truth
use abstract classes for data loader and return object

Chat Edit: 'can you edit my code structure? I want a base data loader class, and to extend that data loader class with all the necessary things for (eg. filtering data, creating the prompt, and anyhting else that needs to be done.) could you please make this edit and extend the data loader for the task detection evaluation?'
Terminal 10, Python Run the command: Toggle Screen Reader Accessibility Mode for an optimized screen reader experience Use Alt+F1 for terminal accessibility help
Ask Copilot to edit your files in
. Copilot will automatically use multiple requests to pick files to edit, run terminal commands, and iterate on errors.
Copilot is powered by AI, so mistakes are possible. Review output carefully before use.
